channel.title: How To Change mod icons on 667/700+
channel.description: Hey i wanna know how to change mod icons in the client/what edior i need?

item.title: How To Change mod icons on 667/700+
item.dc:creator: @NexRSPS NexRSPS
item.description:
@NexRSPS wrote:

I’m pretty sure 99% of the 700+ cache’s do not have a sprite folder.
Use this(Sprite Editor): http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=554897.0
select your cache in the file tab(be sure to find the cache in your source/data/cache (select that folder, then click OK)
Sprite ID: 1455
Change the frames (their all the crowns[mod,admin,donator ect.)
then click Replace Sprite with the desired crown

Your Welcome:)

Read full topic
item.source: How To Change mod icons on 667/700+
